main event: A military report documented a sighting of a steady white light in the sky over Blacksburg, Virginia.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes and the object was observed moving in a straight line from SW to NE., The object was described as a steady white light, comparable to a second-magnitude star., No speed or source change was noted during the observation., The object was identified as a satellite (ECHO II) in the conclusion of the report., The report was authored by Lt Col Theodore M. Fite, a rated Command Pilot.
sighted object: a steady white light in the sky
witness description: Lt Col Theodore M. Fite, a rated Command Pilot
